mapper.select: SELECT id, name, height, debut_date as debutDate, description, is_deleted as isDeleted, image_path as imagePath, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM characters;
SELECT id, name, height, debut_date as debutDate, description, is_deleted as isDeleted, image_path as imagePath, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM characters WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO characters (name, height, debut_date, description, is_deleted, image_path, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{height}, #{debutDate}, #{description}, #{isDeleted}, #{imagePath}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
mapper.update: UPDATE characters SET name = #{name}, height = #{height},debut_date = #{debutDate},description = #{description}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted},image_path = #{imagePath}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id};
